intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Use Harley-Davidson SYN3 20W-50 or equivalent V-twin oil.
Drain and replace primary chaincase lubricant (1 qt). Use Harley-Davidson Formula+ or SYN3.
Drain and replace transmission lubricant. Use Harley-Davidson SYN3 or equivalent gear oil.
Replace spark plugs. Use Harley-Davidson 6R12 or NGK DCPR7E equivalent.
Replace air filter element. Clean and re-oil if using reusable filter.
Inspect drive belt for cracks, fraying, or missing teeth. Check belt tension.
Replace front and rear brake fluid. Use DOT 4 brake fluid.
Check front and rear brake pad wear. Replace when at minimum thickness.
Replace front fork oil. Inspect fork seals and bushings.
Check battery terminals for corrosion. Test battery voltage and charging system output.
